sentences.sentence: In its earliest form, genius was concerned with the ability of the head of the family, the paterfamilias, to perpetuate himself.
sentences.translation: 在其最初的词形当中，天才一词与一种能力有关，即家族首领（男性家长）延续自身的能力。

sentences.sentence: So sons legally were still under their paterfamilias.
sentences.translation: 所以法律上儿子仍属于他们的家长。

sentences.sentence: As the paterfamilias, you have to work hard to support your family.
sentences.translation: 作为一家之主，你必须努力工作养家。
